name: Golden Wolflord
title: "King of the Riftwolves" Golden Wolflord
desc: A twisted beast from another world. This creature is the ruler of the Riftwolves, and wields the power to command them to dissolve space itself.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with the Golden Wolflord

skills.name: Howling Riftcall
skills.desc: Deals 1 Geo DMG, attaches 2 stacks of Golden Corrosion to target character, and summons Rifthound Skull.

skills.name: Golden Cankerbind
skills.desc: Deals 3 Geo DMG, deals 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters on standby, then attaches Golden Corrosion to all opposing characters.
